detail_desc: Short, fitted dress in lace with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and scalloped trim around the neckline and hem. Partly lined.
Shirt in soft washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in stretch jersey with concealed elastication at the waist, a visible zip at the back and slim legs.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Pull-on trousers in an airy organic cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and tapered legs with large leg pockets.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, A-line skirt with a zip at the back and flounce at the hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Gently tailored, V-neck shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and visible seams.
Pyjama bottoms in fleece with a ribbed elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Wide blouse in soft cotton flannel with a collar, V-neck, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover and frill trim at the top. Long sleeves, a seam with a drawstring at the waist and a double layered skirt with a frill trim. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey with a slight sheen. Short cap sleeves and faux feathers around the hem.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and one back pocket. Tapered legs with decorative seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-patterned knit containing some wool with a fluffy finish. Stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Imitation suede sandals with an adjustable ankle strap and block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft modal jersey.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

Trousers in soft, supple leather with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with seams above the knees and raw-edge hems. Partly lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a small chest pocket.

Long satin dress with draping. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and knot detail at the front, and short sleeves. Concealed zip in the side, a seam at the waist and a draped skirt. Lined at the top.
Loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.

Soft, featherlight nursing bra in mesh, microfibre and lace with soft, flexible underwiring and lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Treggings in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs.
Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, short, flounced sleeves and a knot detail at the hem. Slight shorter front and elastication at the back of the hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waistband containing a concealed key pocket and contrasting colour panels down the sides of the legs.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a small opening at the back. High waist, lined gusset and a string back.

Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while running. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and ventilating mesh at the crotch for increased ventilation. Legs with reflective details for increased visibility outdoors and a slit in one side of the hems. Soft jersey inner shorts.

Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in twill with a zip down the front, wide shoulder straps and patch side pockets with a flap. Seam at the waist and a detachable fabric belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and slits in the sides.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a print motif, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Imitation leather sandals with braided straps and long, narrow straps at the top that tie around the legs. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a lace yoke and gently rounded hem.
Skirt in a textured weave with a concealed zip in one side and a flounce at the hem. Asymmetric cut with a knee-length front section and calf-length back.

Long T-shirt in slub cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Round neckline with a raw, roll edge, a chest pocket and a rounded hem at the front. Longer at the back.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes along the sides.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Rib-knit wool jumper with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Vest top in cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline, deep armholes with raw edges, and short slits in the sides.

LIMITED EDITION. Kaftan in an airy weave containing glittery threads with a round, pleated neckline. Opening at the front with ties at the top, a decorative drawstring on the shoulders and cap sleeves. Two box pleats at the back for added width, and slits in the sides. Chiffon underdress.
Knee-length, printed swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Leather loafers with soft heel caps and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a small appliqué on the turned-up hem.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit – a modern fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in slub cotton jersey with an embroidered motif at the top and a longer layer at the hem with a scalloped broderie anglaise trim.
Fitted, calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a deep V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Fixed drawstring down the front to create a draped effect.
Boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Calf-length skirt in soft, ribbed jersey with covered elastication at the top. Unlined.

Calf-length chiffon dress with a grandad collar, buttons at the top and long, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and lower down the skirt. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and rounded hem.
Fitted dress in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Large nylon shopper with handles in imitation leather with decorative metal studs, a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 19.5x33x36 cm.
Shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short skirt in a sturdier stretch weave with metal buttons down the front, a wide, detachable belt with a covered metal buckle and large flap patch pockets at the sides. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the hips and above the hem. Unlined.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with a decorative bow on the front.

Short, double-breasted coat in woven fabric with notch lapels and long sleeves with a tab at the cuffs. Handwarmer pockets, large patch front pockets and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with knitted ears on top and a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Soft viscose jersey T-shirt in a slightly wider style with a V-neck.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a small print motif on one sleeve, a seam centre front and an asymmetric hem. Longer at the back.

Suit trousers in woven fabric containing some wool with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Necklaces in various lengths and designs. One ball chain choker and two slightly longer necklaces with a pendant. Adjustable length 37-45 cm, 46.5-52 cm and 54.5-60.5 cm.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Round-necked blouse in airy crinkled jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck, balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an overlocked hem.
Short-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on the shoulders and a gathered seam at the top. Sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric. Buttons down the front, chest pocket, yoke with gathers at the back and tie at the hem. Rounded at the back.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Short one-shoulder top in a fine, sturdy knit with a wide flounce at the top.

Short dress in mesh with a flock print. Flounces over the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Flounce-trimmed yoke at the front, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Boxy-stye top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Unlined hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Cable-knit hat with a faux fur pompom.
Long-sleeved top in cotton piqué with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted details, a tab with a press-stud at the top and a zip down the front. Sturdy, rib-knit section under the arms and down the sides, a zip at the cuffs and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
